description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6} mod 7.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,1,-1).
formula: G.f.: x^2*(1+x+x^2+x^3+2*x^4+x^5) / ( (1+x)*(1+x+x^2)*(x^2-x+1)*(x-1)^2 ). - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 25 2011From _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 07 2015: (Start)a(n) = a(n-1)+a(n-6)-a(n-7), n>7.a(n) = n + 1 + floor((n-2)/6) - ceiling((n-1)/6) + floor((n-1)/6) - ceiling(n/6) + floor(n/6). (End)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..100] | n mod 7 in [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 08 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
